title: AI shift requires new breed of leaders - Globe CEO
description: MANILA, Philippines — Globe Telecom President and CEO Carl Cruz said artificial intelligence (AI) is forcing businesses to rethink not only their operations but also the kind of leadership needed to thrive in a rapidly changing digital world.
content:

title: ‘Godfather of AI’ Geoffrey Hinton warns AI will trigger mass unemployment: ‘It will make most people poorer’
description: Geoffrey Hinton has repeatedly voiced concerns about the unchecked growth of artificial intelligence.
content:
Awarded the Nobel Prize last year for his pioneering work in AI, Hinton has increasingly raised alarm over the risks of unchecked technological progress. He warned that without proper oversight, AI could destabilise global labour markets.

title: Steel sector eyes AI, green transition financing
description: The steel industry is set to integrate artificial intelligence in operations and push for green transition financing, aiming to boost efficiency, sustainability, and competitiveness in India.
content:
Steel industry stakeholders will gather on Monday to discuss ways to ensure the sector's growth using artificial intelligence (AI) in value chain, financing for green transition and increasing raw material availability.

title: Survey Results Show People Prefer More Human Involvement in AI-driven Art

title: AI: False Savior of a Hollowed-Out Economy
description: Learn how Artificial Intelligence (AI) is perceived as a last hope for an economy burdened by years of financial mismanagement.
content:
What nobody seems to notice is all the incentives for deploying AI are perverse.
The real story of the US economy isn’t about AI, it’s about an economy that’s run out of rope. AI is being hyped not just by promoters reaping billions of dollars in sto... [8195 chars]

title: old computer whiz, known as God’s influencer, a saint
description: Like Francis before him, Leo has expressed concern about the risks of technology, particularly artificial intelligence, and about online relationships replacing human ones.
